drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "China's Sage of Music"

field_speakers.processed: Leon Botstein (Bard College), Jindong Cai (US-China Music Institute)

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music

field_description.processed: The opening event of the China Now Music Festival traces the story of Beethoven’s ascent into the cultural imagination of China. Bard College President Leon Botstein shares remarks on Beethoven’s universal appeal and enduring relevance, followed by performances by Bard’s The Orchestra Now and the Shanghai Youth Philharmonic. Host Jindong Cai, the artistic director of the festival and the director of the US-China Music Institute, will provide historical context for the festival.
